text:
Yes you just need compatible 22H2 LCU version (recommended 22621.2428, minimum
22621.2283) add the LCU, then add the EKB you can use 22621.1 install.wim from
scratch, or any updated 22621.xxxx install.wim

metadata.topic: Re: 23H2 being dribbled out on Windows update
